content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #175

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section: Overview
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary:

Comment: The Overview should be written such that a person unfamiliar could grasp the purpose of the document. The first paragraph of "Security Considerations" (which does not seem to be part of the ballot) is an excellent start.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #175

Agreed, the specification gets a little to much into the weeds in the overview. Suggest we lift in parts from the "Security Considerations" and move some of the technical details further into the document
